title: Skin shop being reset, then giving exactly the same skins as before
body: So the skin shop came out, i was rather dissapointed with what i got, everyone said it was being reworked so i was rather excited, all of my friends got a good shop second time round, ive checked mine and i have FOUR of the exact same skins as my last shop pre change, theyre even in the same place, is this a bug or am i REALLY just that unlucky? been super dissapointed ive been so hyped and its been fairly disheartening, can anyone enlighten me as to if this is by design and i really am just beyond unlucky

replies.body: Hmmmm you might have just gotten unlucky, but it kind of sounds like maybe you were actually seeing the 2nd round of offers. You can hit us up in a ticket to confirm and purchase your old offers though if you'd like!

Not sure. it feels like its what my new shop is, just that i got given four of the exact same skins in the same place seems a little TOO unlucky, as i said two of the skins changed from the previous one, and four remained the same, i submitted a help ticket for it yesterday but no such luck
https://i.imgur.com/4P3VTCP.png this is my shop before and after the change so in some cases after ive looked, its even a case of two of my deals actually got worse

Yea looks like you just got most of the same skins again. it's not necessarily worse deals just different ones. Those EU agents will be able to help you get whichever deals your wanting in your ticket soon!
